title: Pain perdu, caramelised pineapple and candy floss
description: Turn eggy bread into a fun dessert. Brioche slices are flavoured with vanilla and rum, fried, then topped with flamed pineapple and whipped cream.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
2 tbsp rum, plus extra to flambé
½ pineapple, peeled and cut into cubes
1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
